ranks.text: On 9/4 Mishima will text you details about a new side quest, Winners Don't Use Cheats. Pursue this sidequest - through the course of the sidequest you will meet Shinya, the Tower Arcana cooperation. Unlocks Down Shot, an ability that lets you spend an entire magazine to guarantee a knock down on an enemy. Uonus: Kindness Up
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks Bullet Hail, which gives you a chance to enter a gun all-out-attack after an ambush. Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Warning Shot, a way to frighten enemies with a threat during shadow negotiations to get them to your side. Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Ammo Pouch, boosting your maximum bullet capacity for each weapon. Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Cheap Shot, reducing the bullets required for a Down Shot. Bonus: Kindness Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:None! That was easy. Bonus: Kindness Up

Impactful conversation choices for this rank:After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: A Mother's Aggression. Unlocks Electric Slug, boosting the damage inflicted by Bullet Hail. Uonus: Kindness Up
To initiate this rank you must have completed the A Mother's Aggression side quest. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:

options.dialogue: "He wants to win at all costs."

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Oda Special, allowing Joker's attacks to ignore resistances to hit resistant enemies.
